### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE compliance_reports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  industry_standard VARCHAR(100),
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE compliance_reports SET compliance_status = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
